path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - OKGToken and Vesting - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Token owner can mint unlimited amount of tokens
findings.description: The token owner has the ability to mint an unlimited amount of tokens.

findings.title: The `release` function may not work if the beneficiariesList is too large
findings.description: The `release` function contains a for-loop fetching through `beneficiariesList` which consumes gas following the length of `beneficiariesList`. So, if the length of `beneficiariesList` is too large, the `release` transaction will run out of gas.

findings.title: Redundant code in `addBeneficiary` function
findings.description: The `addBeneficiary` contains a require statement verifying the `_beneficary` which was handled in the `zeroAddr` modifier.
